projectDescription: Mobile app that allows you to play an interactive story around the city of Malmö. The app uses gps to navigate the user through the story. This was part of a university project.
An app that allows you to explore the Swedish landscape and its collection of Province animals and flowers. This was part of a university project.
Tama is a tamagotchi game that allows you to interact with your pet and check other users pets. When the pet is hungry it gets mad at you. This was part of a university project.
Pallet generator that allows you to create your own random pallets this project uses: colormind.io/api. This was part of a university project.
Dynamo Sax is a Graphic design project where i created a design for a imaginary barbershop. The image shows one of the products i created in this assignment. This was part of a university project.

A poster project where i created a design for a imaginary event based on a real event that was about to happen in Malmö, The design is inspired by the art from Bauhaus art style. This was part of a university project.
Munamii is an e-commerce website created with react. The functionality is not fully implemented, only the frontEnd part.
C# Console Application that allows you to track your assets.
C# Console Application that allows you add, edit and delete tasks.
